description:
The Apocryphos is an autonomous, sentient Innocence that possesses a humanoid form. It is the guardian of the Heart, the central Innocence whose existence maintains the others. It also refers to itself as the "Grim Reaper of the Noah" because its body and powers are the polar opposite of those of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah].
Because it is the Heart`s guardian, the Noah have been searching for the Apocryphos for 7000 years because it is known to stay close to the Heart, the Noah`s target.
The Apocryphos can appear as a normal human being and is disguised as an unnamed http://anidb.net/ch84793 [Cardinal] of the Church visiting the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. It can assimilate other Innocence and use the Innocence to locate Exorcists. It also seems to possess telepathic abilities and can render people unconscious and erase their memories. Many of its abilities have a feather-like motif. It is also very quick and powerful and can easily outmaneuver http://anidb.net/ch84585 [CROW] member http://anidb.net/ch83363 [Howard Link] and Noah http://anidb.net/ch84615 [Tyki Mikk].
The Apocryphos seems to have murdered http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian] with the General`s own anti-Akuma weapon and later attempts to assimilate http://anidb.net/ch84637 [Allen Walker]. However, Allen managed to escape.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Apocryphos
